item.title: Vim Notes
item.author: sky_io@outlook.com (K4i)
item.description: my simple config my simple config can be found here: .dotfiles/.vimrc widows C-w s horizontal split window C-w v vertical split window C-w q quit a window C-w h/j/k/l move between windows C-w H/J/K/L make current master window C-w +/- inc/dec height, can prepend with a number C-w >/< inc/dec width, can prepend with a number jump C-o jump back C-i jump forward Folding zc: fold/close current tree zo: unfold/open current tree za: toggle fold Search and replace https://vim.
item.dc:creator: K4i
